# Government Tender Announcement
**Title:** REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS – JIRA PARTNER
**Reference Number:** MX-22774023238

## Overview
Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is seeking a partner to assist in the implementation of Enterprise Delivery and Product Centric delivery approach based on the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe). FCC will use Jira Cloud and Jira Align for managing enterprise outcomes. The suitable partner will conduct an assessment of the current environment, migrate data, train employees, and provide long-term support and development services.

## Mandatory Requirements
- The partner must be a recognized North American Jira Align Platinum or Gold Partner.
- A detailed proposal must be submitted electronically through MERX by June 27, 2023, at 2:00 PM.

## Document Repository
All documents and bid details are available on MERX at https://www.merx.com. 

## Key Dates
- RFP Release Date: June 2, 2023
- Deadline for submitting questions: June 12, 2023, at 2:00 PM
- Date of bidding: June 27, 2023, at 2:00 PM

## Tender Details
- Effective Date of Contract: Up to six (6) years
- Options: Not applicable
- Estimated Quantity of Goods or Services: Not applicable
- Timeframe for Delivery of Goods or Services: Not applicable

## Funding/Tenders
This opportunity is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) Chapter 5 (Government Procurement) and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) Chapter 19 (Government Procurement).

## Contact Information
- Adam Gottselig
- Procurement and Vendor Manager
- Farm Credit Canada
- procurement@fcc.ca

## Confederation of Industry Standard Classification (CSIC)
The tenders must be submitted in electronic form through MERX; proposals submitted in other formats, by other means, or through any other means, or after the closing date mentioned above may be rejected by FCC.
